steps.title:
Welcome to the
Mikedcares app
professionalâ€™s Survey
steps.text: Get ready for a bunch of super random questions!

steps.title: Designated Position?
steps.text: Do you provide perinatal mental health care services?

steps.title: Professionals?
steps.text: How Many years of experience in providing care do you have?

answerFormat.hint: Please enter your years of experience

steps.title: Professionals?
steps.text: Do you have an up-to-date license of practice ?

steps.title: Professionals?
steps.text: Do you understand the importance of confidentiality when providing care?

steps.title: Professionals?
steps.text: Are you willing to be extra patient with your clients and execute the appropriate ethics of practice to the best of your capabilities?

steps.title: Professionals?
steps.text: Have you ever had a legal issue in relation to your practice?

steps.title: Professionals?
steps.text: Have you recently reviewed your mental health as a mental health care provider?

steps.title: Professionals?
steps.text: Will you be willing to provide your certifications for vetting?

steps.title: Kindly upload all relevant documents & certifications with verifiable links for vetting?

answerFormat.hint: Kindly upload the certifications & licenses to one-drive and share the link with us here

steps.title: Professionals?
steps.text: You understand that we are a social enterprise and you are willing to reduce your fees to accommodate clients?

steps.title: Professionals?
steps.text: Do you have access to good internet?
Thanks for taking the survey, we will match you with client!
steps.title: Done!
